      • mFontStyle

        protected int mFontStyle
        mFontStyle can be Typeface.NORMAL or Typeface.ITALIC. mFontWeight can be Typeface.NORMAL or Typeface.BOLD.

      • mFontWeight

        protected int mFontWeight

      • mFontFamily

        protected java.lang.String mFontFamily
        NB: If a font family is used that does not have a style in a certain Android version (ie. monospace bold pre Android 5.0), that style (ie. bold) will not be inherited by nested Text nodes. To retain that style, you have to add it to those nodes explicitly.

        Example, Android 4.4: 

         Bold Text
   Bold Text
     Bold Text

 Not Bold Text
   Not Bold Text
     Not Bold Text

 Not Bold Text
   Bold Text
     Bold Text

      • mFontFeatureSettings

        protected java.lang.String mFontFeatureSettings
